subSections.title: Glyph origin
subSections.text:
{{Han etyl}}
{{Han compound|門|一|廾|t1=door|t2=latch|t3=a pair of hands|ls=ic}} — a pair of hands opening a latched door. {{zh-l|*一}} and {{zh-l|*廾}} are combined into {{zh-l|*开}} since the seal script.
